verses.verse: My son <S%H1121><s%>, if you be sure <S%H6148><s%> for your friend <S%H7453><s%>, if you have struck <S%H8628><s%> your hand <S%H3709><s%> with a stranger <S%H2114><s%>,
You are snared <S%H3369><s%> with the words <S%H561><s%> of your mouth <S%H6310><s%>, you are taken <S%H3920><s%> with the words <S%H561><s%> of your mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

Do <S%H6213><s%> this now <S%H645><s%>, my son <S%H1121><s%>, and deliver <S%H5337><s%> yourself <S%H935><s%>, when you are come into the hand <S%H3709><s%> of your friend <S%H7453><s%>; go <S%H3212><s%>, humble <S%H7511><s%> yourself <S%H7292><s%>, and urge your friend <S%H7453><s%>.
Give <S%H5414><s%> not sleep <S%H8142><s%> to your eyes <S%H5869><s%>, nor slumber <S%H8572><s%> to your eyelids <S%H6079><s%>.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> yourself as a roe <S%H6643><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the hunter <S%H6833><s%>, and as a bird from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the fowler <S%H3353><s%>.
Go <S%H3212><s%> to the ant <S%H5244><s%>, you sluggard <S%H6102><s%>; consider <S%H7200><s%> her ways <S%H1870><s%>, and be wise <S%H2449><s%>:
Which having no guide <S%H7101><s%>, overseer <S%H7860><s%>, or ruler <S%H4910><s%>,
Provides <S%H3559><s%> her food <S%H3899><s%> in the summer <S%H7019><s%>, and gathers <S%H103><s%> her food <S%H3978><s%> in the harvest <S%H7105><s%>.
How long will you sleep <S%H7901><s%>, O sluggard <S%H6102><s%>? when will you arise <S%H6965><s%> out of your sleep <S%H8142><s%>?
Yet a little <S%H4592><s%> sleep <S%H8142><s%>, a little <S%H4592><s%> slumber <S%H8572><s%>, a little <S%H4592><s%> folding <S%H2264><s%> of the hands <S%H3027><s%> to sleep <S%H7901><s%>:
So shall your poverty <S%H7389><s%> come <S%H935><s%> as one that travels <S%H1980><s%>, and your want <S%H4270><s%> as a armed <S%H4043><s%> man <S%H376><s%>.
A naughty <S%H1100><s%> person <S%H120><s%>, a wicked <S%H205><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, walks <S%H1980><s%> with a perverse <S%H6143><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
He winks <S%H7169><s%> with his eyes <S%H5869><s%>, he speaks <S%H4448><s%> with his feet <S%H7272><s%>, he teaches <S%H3384><s%> with his fingers <S%H676><s%>;
Perversity <S%H8419><s%> is in his heart <S%H3820><s%>, he devises <S%H2790><s%> mischief <S%H7451><s%> continually <S%H6256><s%>; he sows <S%H7971><s%> discord <S%H4066><s%>.
Therefore shall his calamity <S%H343><s%> come <S%H935><s%> suddenly <S%H6597><s%>; suddenly <S%H6621><s%> shall he be broken <S%H7665><s%> without remedy <S%H4832><s%>.
These six <S%H8337><s%> things does the Lord <S%H3068><s%> hate <S%H8130><s%>: Yes <S%H7651><s%>, seven are a abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto him <S%H5315><s%>:
A proud <S%H7311><s%> look <S%H5869><s%>, a lying <S%H8267><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%>, and hands <S%H3027><s%> that shed <S%H8210><s%> innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>,
A heart <S%H3820><s%> that devises <S%H2790><s%> wicked <S%H205><s%> imaginations <S%H4284><s%>, feet <S%H7272><s%> that are swift <S%H4116><s%> in running <S%H7323><s%> to mischief <S%H7451><s%>,
A false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> that speaks <S%H6315><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%>, and he that sows <S%H7971><s%> discord <S%H4090><s%> among brothers <S%H251><s%>.
My son <S%H1121><s%>, keep <S%H5341><s%> your father <S%H1><s%>'s commandment <S%H4687><s%>, and forsake <S%H5203><s%> not the law <S%H8451><s%> of your mother <S%H517><s%>:
Bind <S%H7194><s%> them continually <S%H8548><s%> upon your heart <S%H3820><s%>, and tie <S%H6029><s%> them about your neck <S%H1621><s%>.
When you go <S%H1980><s%>, it shall lead <S%H5148><s%> you <S%H7901><s%>; when you sleep, it shall keep <S%H8104><s%> you <S%H6974><s%>; and when you awake, it shall talk with you <S%H7878><s%>.

For the commandment <S%H4687><s%> is a lamp <S%H5216><s%>; and the law <S%H8451><s%> is light <S%H216><s%>; and reproofs <S%H8433><s%> of instruction <S%H4148><s%> are the way <S%H1870><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>:
To keep <S%H8104><s%> you from the evil <S%H7451><s%> woman <S%H802><s%>, from the flattery <S%H2513><s%> of the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of a strange woman <S%H5237><s%>.
Lust <S%H2530><s%> not after her beauty <S%H3308><s%> in your heart <S%H3824><s%>; neither let her take <S%H3947><s%> you with her eyelids <S%H6079><s%>.

For by means of <S%H1157><s%> a whorish <S%H2181><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> a man is brought to a piece <S%H3603><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>: and the adulteress <S%H802><s%> will hunt <S%H6679><s%> for the precious <S%H3368><s%> life <S%H5315><s%>.
Can a man <S%H376><s%> take <S%H2846><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in his bosom <S%H2436><s%>, and his clothes <S%H899><s%> not be burned <S%H8313><s%>?
Can one <S%H376><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> upon hot coals <S%H1513><s%>, and his feet <S%H7272><s%> not be burned <S%H3554><s%>?
So he that goes in <S%H935><s%> to his neighbors <S%H7453><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>; whoever touches <S%H5060><s%> her shall not be innocent <S%H5352><s%>.
Men do not despise <S%H936><s%> a thief <S%H1590><s%>, if he steal <S%H1589><s%> to satisfy <S%H4390><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> when he is hungry <S%H7456><s%>;
But if he be found <S%H4672><s%>, he shall restore <S%H7999><s%> sevenfold <S%H7659><s%>; he shall give <S%H5414><s%> all the substance <S%H1952><s%> of his house <S%H1004><s%>.
But whoever commits adultery <S%H5003><s%> with a woman <S%H802><s%> lacks <S%H2638><s%> understanding <S%H3820><s%>: he that does <S%H6213><s%> it destroys <S%H7843><s%> his own soul <S%H5315><s%>.
A wound <S%H5061><s%> and dishonor <S%H7036><s%> shall he get <S%H4672><s%>; and his reproach <S%H2781><s%> shall not be wiped away <S%H4229><s%>.
For jealousy <S%H7068><s%> is the rage <S%H2534><s%> of a man <S%H1397><s%>: therefore he will not spare <S%H2550><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of vengeance <S%H5359><s%>.
He will not regard <S%H5375><s%> any ransom <S%H3724><s%>; neither will he rest content <S%H14><s%>, though you give many <S%H7235><s%> gifts <S%H7810><s%>.
